biotools.summary:
Representation of k-mer sets using spectrum-preserving string sets.

UST is a bioinformatics tool for constructing a spectrum-preserving string set (SPSS) representation from sets of k-mers.

bioschemas.name: UST
bioschemas.summary:
Representation of k-mer sets using spectrum-preserving string sets.

UST is a bioinformatics tool for constructing a spectrum-preserving string set (SPSS) representation from sets of k-mers.
